reviewTitle: Very nice food and lovely service
review_details: A bit difficult to find but well worth it. Lovely fresh food and excellent service at reasonable prices. Highly recommend it and will visit again next time.

My wife and I decided to go on an afternoon fishing trip with Makaroynas Vassilis. Brilliant day out. Antwan and Antonis made every effort possible including a great dinner of fresh fish, salad, bread and dessert. Highly recommend it. H and L

reviewTitle: Great food, friendly staff, excellent service
review_details: Highly recommend this restaurant. Loved the food. Staff were very friendly. Great atmosphere. Will definitely visit again.
